verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. I was glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> when they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto me, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Our feet <S%H7272><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, O Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.
Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> is builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8803><s%> as a city <S%H5892><s%> that is compact <S%H2266><s%> <S%H8795><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>:

Whither <S%H8033><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the YY <S%H3050><s%>, unto the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
For there are set <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thrones <S%H3678><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%>, the thrones <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.
Pray <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8798><s%> for the peace <S%H7965><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: they shall prosper <S%H7951><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee.
Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within thy walls <S%H2426><s%>, and prosperity <S%H7962><s%> within thy palaces <S%H759><s%>.
For my brethren <S%H251><s%> and companions <S%H7453><s%> ' sakes, I will now say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within thee.
Because of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> I will seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy good <S%H2896><s%>.
